title: 03/19/21 DPS Hour 3 Jim Jackson
itunes:title: 03/19/21 DPS Hour 3 Jim Jackson
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, FOX Sports and Turner Sports broadcaster and basketball analyst Jim Jackson opines on the Tom Izzo-Gabe Brown halftime incident from Friday night’s NCAA Tournament play-in game between Michigan State and UCLA. Plus, legendary baseball play-by-play announcer Jim Brockmire (Hank Azaria) stops by to reflect on a variety of sports topics.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
